title: Learning Style-based Personalized Instructional Design: Social Domain Microlearning Application

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social science concepts and experience in diagnosing learning styles
context.additional_context: Requires tailored pedagogical design to effectively deliver social science theories in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, with formative assessment-driven real-time feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose and explain their preferred learning styles using the VARK model.
Learners can select social studies microlearning content tailored to their learning styles and complete it with at least 80% proficiency.
Learners can analyze the effectiveness of teaching methods by learning style through peer assessment and propose implementation strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
